{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_CheckThrowBomb2}} '''A_CheckThrowBomb2'''
(no parameters)
If the calling actor's combined velocities are less than 1.5 units, and its vertical velocity is less than 2, it is put in its Spawn state +6, its altitude is set to the floor, its vertical velocity is set to 0, its {{flag|Bouncing|bounce}} flags are all cleared as well as its {{flag|MISSILE}} flag. Whether the above happened or not, the codepointer then calls [[A_CheckThrowBomb]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrowingBomb}} and derived classes.
